Apakiritūna，at Th.2，447 T （reading of C. is abhi°） is explained ThA.271 to mean apakiritvā chaḍḍetvā throwing away，slighting，offending. The correct etym = Sk. avakirati （ava + kṛ2 to strew，cast out） in sense “to cast off，reject”，to which also belongs kirāta in meaning “cast off” i. e. man of a so-called low tribe. See also avakirati 2. （Page 50）
